sense.def:
Kar je
white
, je enake barve kot sneg ali mleko.

seg.quote: There were little white clouds high in the blue sky.
A woman dressed in white came up to me.

sense.def:
Kdor je
white
, ima bledo kožo in je evropskega rodu.

seg.quote: They had never seen a white person before.
The race riots had been caused by whites attacking blacks.

sense.def:
To go white
pomeni, da naši lasje z leti postajajo beli.

seg.quote: My grandfather went white at the age of fifty.

sense.def:
To go white
pomeni postati zelo bled od strahu ali šoka.

seg.quote: My sister went white with rage.

sense.def:
Kava, ki je
white
, vsebuje mleko ali smetano.

Vino, ki je
white
, je bledo rumenkaste barve.

The white of an egg
je prozorna tekočina, ki obdaja jajčni rumenjak.

The white of someone's eye
je beli del očesnega zrkla.
